attributes.action: make a National Make Someone Happy Day and for the Prime Minister to make this a public day and eventually push for a world day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a chance for as many people as possible to finally stand up and be counted for.  You see how people are so misserable these days, its because everyone has lost the "Love".  If everyone can do one act of kindness and to make someone happy even something as small as a joke then its worth that extra happiness for that one moment of their lifetime!!  To acknowledge people when they are sad and to give them something to be happy about, that is what this petition is about...Remeber a Smile a day keeps the doctor away!!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
